name: Luden's Echo
passive: Echo: Damaging an enemy with an ability hurls an orb at them that deals magic damage to the first enemy hit.
tips: Luden's EchoAbilities deal bonus damage +85 Ability Power +7% Magic Penetration +300 Max Mana +20 Ability HasteDiscordic Echo: Moving and casting abilities builds Discord.
At 100 Discord your next damaging active ability or empowered attack deals 110 (+ 10% AP) bonus magic damage to your target and up to 3 nearby enemies.
